## Observation notes  
Franklin 1913: <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Mt.Cheam</span>. Lutz and Cockerell 1920: <span class="hl-place-name">Duncan</span>. Brown 1934: <span class="hl-place-name">Agassiz</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Cranbrook</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Departure Bay</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Victoria</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Wellington</span>. Buckell 1951: <span class="hl-place-name">Hope</span> Mts.; <span class="hl-place-name">Manning Park</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Buccaneer Bay</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Royal Oak</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Sahtlam</span>; <span class="hl-place-name">Ladysmith</span>. MacKenzie and Winston 1984: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Biodiversity Galiano Life List: (G.G.E. Scudder), 1975, Galiano.
